TopicTitle: KSP Cant enter the buildings recover vessels etc.

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, 

I've installed a gamedata folder that contains a lot of useful mods . But the game started crashing then I've deleted my game data folder and installed it again on steam. But when I enter my profile (save) I can't enter building. Nothing works. When I start new game it works. I've my save file now how can I recover my game. Because I've really dealt with this game and built stations, outpost etc. 

 

Also is it possible to open older quick saves ?

Edited January 9, 2016 by berkekrkn
Omg I solved it by loading quicksave.sfs. I am really happy now :))
This is a support issue rather than a gameplay question. The thread has been moved in hopes that someone can shed some light on the issue for you.
